posts.post_content:
Hi,
I am working on a T card sampler on the PSA site.
I need an affordable (any grade) PSA cards from these issues:L
Obacks 
T-203 Comic BB
T-209,210,211
The key is any PSA card that is cheap, so I can afford it!
Thank You,
Bill Hedin
[url]bh3443@aol.com[/url]
ps: I'll need a T-200, a double-folder & triple folder at some point!
Also, I'm accumulating T cards (other cards/pins) graded/raw of Eros "Cy" Barger, if you have any affordable ones, please email me!@
Thanks,
Bill Hedin
